attributes.action: allow Higher and Further Education tuition fees to be regarded as an expense for the purpose of Income Tax relief.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increases in tuition fees act as a disincentive to encourage students to progress to full time further or higher education. To compensate for this disincentive, this petition calls on the government to allow further and higher education tuition fees to be deductible against income tax.
